events.message: I recently received my order but the product does not match the description, and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request involves a refund due to dissatisfaction with the received product, so the case is categorized under Refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Maria, who specializes in handling refund requests efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund. I'm here to assist you with this process.
Could you please provide the order number and a brief description of why you want a refund to help us process your request quickly?
The order number is 4587392. The item was not as described on the website, and the quality was very poor, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a return shipping label to send the product back at no cost.
I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions on how to return the product for the refund. Thank you very much!
Your refund has been processed, and the return label has been emailed to you. Please ship the item at your earliest convenience.
We are following up to confirm you received the return label and to check if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Since your refund process appears complete and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your cooperation.
